name: Kaboom Monsters
description: KaBoom Monsters is a revolutionary fantasy strategic card game. You create your own cards, develop your deck and jump into an epic single player campaign with a series of battles. KaBoom Monsters offers a unique card/object crafting system allowing you to pimp up your weapons, shields and add different objects to boost your deck.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or higher Processor: 1.8 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with 512 MB of VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
